oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Margaret Wright, 1976 August 30, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Margaret Wright, conducted on 30 August 1976 by Ann Wells as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Wright describes the different areas and exhibits at the Centennial, including the Chinese and Mexican villages, a replica of Anne Hathaway's cottage, and a replica of a pyramid. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
